summary: Seeking a new opportunity:Raymond Collins is a highly qualified and seasoned Senior/Lead Software Analyst/Manager with extensive project lead and software procurement experience.  Raymond excels at leading cross-functional teams and coordinating multiple projects simultaneously.  Spanning 20+ years, Raymond has proven to be a solutions-oriented professional with notable success directing a broad range of IT initiatives while participating in planning and implementation of systems solutions in direct support of targeted business objectives. His particular areas of expertise include: negotiating software licensing agreements (SLAs), providing training and support of emerging technologies, and installing/configuring software for various clients.My Top 5 Clifton StrengthsFinder Results:  1. Strategic  2. Responsibility  3. Context  4, Learner  5. Consistency
